boat.name: Truant
boat.full_description: Full detailed description and photographs available by email contact David Heather at sue.heather@btinternet.com
boat.short_description:
Truant is a rebuild project on its own twin axle bespoke 1500 kg trailer. Motor bike accident stopped project .
Truant has been dry stored since 1992.
Boat is near fully stripped in near full kit form with iroko, cabin roof, hatch supplied by Salterns in late 1990,s, Full set of spars, sails (top sail not used), Lead ballast, Stainless steel standing rigging new, Wykham Martin fore stay self furling,Â 
Choice of engines outboard or inboard, currently fitted with controllable pitch propellor and shaft by Water Mota.
Mast, keel stepped, All steel work galvanised, requires new running rigging.
Cockpit cover.
Comprehensive build plans and drawings, history.
